mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiadian_order_uuid_number as jiadianOrderUuidNumber ,a.address_id as addressId ,a.jiadian_id as jiadianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.buy_number as buyNumber ,a.jiadian_order_true_price as jiadianOrderTruePrice ,a.jiadian_order_courier_name as jiadianOrderCourierName ,a.jiadian_order_courier_number as jiadianOrderCourierNumber ,a.jiadian_order_types as jiadianOrderTypes ,a.jiadian_order_payment_types as jiadianOrderPaymentTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
